scripts.install: npm run build && npm run publish
scripts.unmangled: rimraf elm-stuff && elm make src/Main.elm --output=naruto-unison-elm.js && mv naruto-unison-elm.js ../templates/play/elm.julius
scripts.dev: npm run build && cd publish && (sleep 2 && opener http://localhost:8000/200.html) & elm reactor
scripts.scrape: cd scraper && rimraf elm-stuff && elm make scraper.elm --output=scraper.js && (sleep 2 && opener http://localhost:8000/scraper.html) & elm reactor
